attributes.action: Give a George Medal to Ingrid Loyau-Kennett
attributes.additional_details: After the Woolwich attack,  Ingrid Loyau-Kennett alone stood up to the terrorists responsible and tried to give first aid to a fatal victim of the terrorists. Showing a undaunted devotion to another person in distress, and incomparable bravery, it is right she is fully honoured for this. Therefore we ask for the Government to ask Her Majesty the Queen to grant her the George Medal.
